CustomField.formula: IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c, "Disruption or Compensation"), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Travel_Based_Disruption__c)))), TEXT( Travel_Based_Disruption__c ), IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c, "Disruption or Compensation"), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( Alternative_Disruption__c )))), TEXT( Alternative_Disruption__c ),NULL ))
CustomField.label: Disruption Contact
